verses.verse: For this cause<WG5484> <WG5127> I<WG1473> Paul,<WG3972> the<WG3588> prisoner<WG1198> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> for<WG5228> you<WG5216> Gentiles,<WG1484>

How that<WG3754> by<WG2596> revelation<WG602> he made known<WG1107> unto me<WG3427> the<WG3588> mystery;<WG3466> (as<WG2531> I wrote afore<WG4270> in<WG1722> few words,<WG3641>
Whereby, <WG4314> <WG3739> when ye read,<WG314> ye may<WG1410> understand<WG3539> my<WG3450> knowledge<WG4907> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> mystery<WG3466> of Christ)<WG5547>

Which <WG3739> in<WG1722> other<WG2087> ages<WG1074> was not<WG3756> made known<WG1107> unto the<WG3588> sons<WG5207> of men,<WG444> as<WG5613> it is now<WG3568> revealed<WG601> unto his<WG846> holy<WG40> apostles<WG652> and<WG2532> prophets<WG4396> by<WG1722> the Spirit;<WG4151>

That the<WG3588> Gentiles<WG1484> should be<WG1511> fellow heirs,<WG4789> and<WG2532> of the same body,<WG4954> and<WG2532> partakers<WG4830> of his<WG846> promise<WG1860> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> by<WG1223> the<WG3588> gospel: <WG2098>

Whereof <WG3739> I was made<WG1096> a minister,<WG1249> according<WG2596> to the<WG3588> gift<WG1431> of the<WG3588> grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316> given<WG1325> unto me<WG3427> by<WG2596> the<WG3588> effectual working<WG1753> of his<WG846> power.<WG1411>

Unto me,<WG1698> who am less than the least<WG1647> of all<WG3956> saints,<WG40> is this<WG3778> grace<WG5485> given,<WG1325> that I should preach<WG2097> among<WG1722> the<WG3588> Gentiles<WG1484> the<WG3588> unsearchable<WG421> riches<WG4149> of Christ;<WG5547>

And <WG2532> to make all men see<WG5461> <WG3956> what<WG5101> is the<WG3588> fellowship<WG2842> of the<WG3588> mystery,<WG3466> which from<WG575> the<WG3588> beginning of the world<WG165> hath been hid<WG613> in<WG1722> God,<WG2316> who created<WG2936> all things<WG3956> by<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ: <WG5547>

To the intent that<WG2443> now<WG3568> unto the<WG3588> principalities<WG746> and<WG2532> powers<WG1849> in<WG1722> heavenly<WG2032> places might be known<WG1107> by<WG1223> the<WG3588> church<WG1577> the<WG3588> manifold<WG4182> wisdom<WG4678> of God,<WG2316>
According <WG2596> to the<WG3588> eternal<WG165> purpose<WG4286> which<WG3739> he purposed<WG4160> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> our<WG2257> Lord: <WG2962>
In <WG1722> whom<WG3739> we have<WG2192> boldness<WG3954> and<WG2532> access<WG4318> with<WG1722> confidence<WG4006> by<WG1223> the<WG3588> faith<WG4102> of him.<WG846>
Wherefore <WG1352> I desire<WG154> that ye faint<WG1573> not<WG3361> at<WG1722> my<WG3450> tribulations<WG2347> for<WG5228> you,<WG5216> which<WG3748> is<WG2076> your<WG5216> glory.<WG1391>
For this cause<WG5484> <WG5127> I bow<WG2578> my<WG3450> knees<WG1119> unto<WG4314> the<WG3588> Father<WG3962> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547>

That Christ<WG5547> may dwell<WG2730> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> hearts<WG2588> by<WG1223> faith;<WG4102> that<WG2443> ye, being rooted<WG4492> and<WG2532> grounded<WG2311> in<WG1722> love,<WG26>

May be able<WG1840> to comprehend<WG2638> with<WG4862> all<WG3956> saints<WG40> what<WG5101> is the<WG3588> breadth,<WG4114> and<WG2532> length,<WG3372> and<WG2532> depth,<WG899> and<WG2532> height;<WG5311>

And <WG5037> to know<WG1097> the<WG3588> love<WG26> of Christ,<WG5547> which passeth<WG5235> knowledge,<WG1108> that<WG2443> ye might be filled<WG4137> with<WG1519> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> fullness<WG4138> of God.<WG2316>

Now <WG1161> unto him that is able<WG1410> to do<WG4160> exceeding abundantly<WG5228> <WG1537> <WG4053> above<WG5228> all<WG3956> that<WG3739> we ask<WG154> or<WG2228> think,<WG3539> according<WG2596> to the<WG3588> power<WG1411> that worketh<WG1754> in<WG1722> us,<WG2254>
